item.title: The Journey to Achieve 1000x TPS for a Real-World Core Banking Application on TiDB
item.description: This session is presented on Percona Community Live Online June 21-23, 2022. Check out the full schedule here. Watch This Talk Here The talk will be live-streamed on several platforms. No registration is required. Feel free to ask your questions in chat. Follow the links now and subscribe to notifications not to miss anything! YouTube LinkedIn Twitter @PerconaBytes Twitch PerconaCommunity Performance tuning is complicated, especially with a distributed database like TiDB.
